name: 36 Days of Type || 0 // Zero (27/36)
description: From Fandom: Zero was one of the several mutants part of Kitty Pryde's mutant resistance. Zero is a mutant with the ability to shift the molecular make-up of his body and his environment into new shapes and forms. He has the ability to sense the make-up of the terrain around him and claims that he can manipulate it through molecular-shifting.
